metadata.title: Richa City GTX Goretex Short Waterproof Motorbike Motorcycle Gloves Black 2XL
description: Richa City Gore-Tex Glove - Black - Gore-Tex waterproof and breathable membrane - Reinforced palm - Reflective detailing - Velcro wrist strap - Padded scaphoid protection - Velcro cuff closure
